name: Share of species threatened
descriptionShort: The share of known species threatened with extinction is only available for a few taxonomic groups where more than 80% of species have been assessed.
datasetName: IUCN Red List Summary Statistics Table 1a

presentation.titlePublic: Share of species threatened with extinction

origins.title: IUCN Red List Summary Statistics Table 1a
origins.description: Number of species evaluated in relation to the overall number of described species, and numbers of threatened species by major groups of organisms.
origins.producer: International Union for Conservation of Nature Red List of Threatened Species
origins.citationFull: International Union for Conservation of Nature. 2025. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2025-1. https://www.iucnredlist.org. Accessed on [27 March 2025]
